solution_line_template: During the two weeks, Matt rode a total of {matt_additional_rides} times + {maurice_rides_with_matt} times = <<{matt_additional_rides}+{maurice_rides_with_matt}={total_matt_rides}>>{total_matt_rides} times.
Before his visit, Maurice had ridden {total_matt_rides} times / {times_factor} = <<{total_matt_rides}/{times_factor}={maurice_rides_before_visit}>>{maurice_rides_before_visit} times.
